name: Ben Token
desc: Ben Token is a decentralized community experiment which is inspired by Elon Musk and Dogecoin.

name: Golden Ben
desc: Golden Ben (GBEN) is the utility and governance token of BenSwap on Binance Smart Chain (BSC).

name: Green Ben
desc: Green Ben (EBEN) is the utility and governance token of BenSwap (smartBCH). BenSwap (smartBCH) starts as clone of BenSwap on Binance Smart Chain and aims to become one of the leading DEXs on smartBCH.

name: Binance-Peg BTCB Token
desc: Bitcoin is a decentralized cryptocurrency originally described in a 2008 whitepaper by a person, or group of people, using the alias Satoshi Nakamoto. It was launched soon after, in January 2009.

name: Binance-Peg Ethereum Token
desc: Ethereum is a decentralized open-source blockchain system that features its own cryptocurrency, Ether. ETH works as a platform for numerous other cryptocurrencies, as well as for the execution of decentralized smart contracts.

name: Binance-Peg BUSD Token
desc: Binance USD (BUSD) is a 1:1 USD-backed stable coin issued by Binance (in partnership with Paxos), Approved and regulated by the New York State Department of Financial Services (NYDFS).

name: Binance-Peg Bitcoin Cash Token
desc: Bitcoin Cash (BCH) is a cryptocurrency that shares many of the same characteristics as Bitcoin (BTC) yet also integrates a number of changes and features that set it apart. It is considered a 'fork' of Bitcoin, although proponents argue that Bitcoin Cash more closely adheres to the original vision of creating a peer-to-peer electronic cash system as laid out in a 2008 white paper written by the founder of the protocol, a person or group going by the pseudonym Satoshi Nakamoto.

name: Binance-Peg Pax Dollar Token
desc: Pax Dollar is a flat-collateralized stablecoin operated by Paxos.

name: Binance-Peg Tether USD
desc: USDT is a stablecoin that mirrors the price of the U.S. dollar, issued by a Hong Kong-based company Tether.

name: Binance-Peg USD Coin
desc: USD Coin is a stablecoin that is pegged to the U.S. dollar on a 1:1 basis. The Centre consortium, which is behind this asset, says USDC is issued by regulated financial institutions.

name: Binance-Peg TrueUSD Token
desc: TUSD is the first digital asset with live on-chain attestations by independent third-party institutions and is backed 1:1 with the U.S. dollar (USD).

name: PancakeSwap Token
desc: CAKE is the utility token of PancakeSwap.
